text: <!here|@here> I built the docker images using the unit tests (BuildImage_Peer, BuildImage_Obcca) as per the instructions, how do i manually start a network to have the peer nodes know about each other? want to perform this “manually” to understand how this works under the cover

this line in peer_basic_impl.py seems to give some hint, am I getting close?

bdd_test_util.cli_call(context, ["docker-compose"] + fileArgsToDockerCompose + ["up","--force-recreate", "-d"], expect_success=True)
never mind, i think i got it
